message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about the nutritional needs of plants. Like all plants, a four-leaf clover needs sunlight for photosynthesis, which is the process through which plants produce their own food. Option (A) is incorrect because being Irish is not a requirement for a clover to feed itself. Option (B) is a superstition and not a biological necessity. Option (D) is unrelated to the nutritional needs of plants and is a type of wild mountain goat.
